thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Danya

author: Danya
title: Danya
text: Mabel's Labels name tapes/stickers are the only ones I have found which actually stay on through repeated washings! Tag Mates are great. They will never come off! Iron-on labels perform very well too. Only at the very end of the camp season do some start peeling off a little. Use the Tag Mates stickers whenever possible. I have used other brands, especially of iron-ons, and these are much better.
